stimulusHtml: The influence that Japanese works such as Hokusai’s Under the Wave off Kanagawa (Kanagawa oki nami ura) had on Mary Cassatt’s work including The Coiffure can be seen in Cassatt’s use of
choicesHtml: figural posture, dramatic lighting, and intricate details
flattened forms, planes of solid color, and rhythmic patterns
delicate shading, angularity, and asymmetrical balance
geometric abstraction, bright colors, and twisted perspective
